    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller()
        Empty Class Constructor

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Calls the splash() method in View Class. Creates 'Main Menu' frame with a few different options.

      • launcherPlay

        public void launcherPlay()
        Method is called by view method when the 'play' button is clicked on the launcher menu. Creates game with default grid.

      • randPlay

        public void randPlay()
        Method is called by view method if 'Random' is clicked in launcher menu. Creates randomised game.

      • designSubmit

        public void designSubmit​(javax.swing.JPanel panel,
                         javax.swing.JFrame frame)
        Parameters:
        panel - Center Panel passed from Design Mode
        frame - Design Frame, used to close design window upon 'Submit' button click The method that contain the action listener for the "Submit" button in design mode.

      • saveSubmit

        public void saveSubmit​(javax.swing.JPanel panel,
                       javax.swing.JFrame frame)
        Button is used in the design panel for 'Save' mode to save the grid to a file for later use.
        Parameters:
        panel - The panel passed by View Class is the scoreBoard Panel.
        frame - The frame passed by View class to dispose of once the button is clicked.

      • playSubmit

        public void playSubmit​(javax.swing.JPanel panel,
                       javax.swing.JFrame frame,
                       Model model)
        Button in play mode to submit your finished grid during play. Upon correct grid, message and final score is displayed, on incorrect guess message is displayed.
        Parameters:
        panel - Panel for button to be added on to, panel passed from View class is scorePanel.
        frame - Frame passed from View class to be disposed if correct guess made.
        model - Model object passed to compare grids from two different model objects. If those two grids match, condition is met.

      • countdown

        public void countdown​(javax.swing.JLabel label,
                      javax.swing.JFrame frame)
        Creates and maintains the timer displayed in the top right of the play window. 'Second' variable in Model class is displayed in the label and is decremented by 1 every second. If 'Second' reaches 0, a message is displayed, and the window closes after a three second delay.
        Parameters:
        label - Label passed from View class for the 'Second' variable to be displayed on.
        frame - Frame passed form View class to be disposed if the time runs out.

      • buttonDetails

        public void buttonDetails​(javax.swing.JPanel panel,
                          boolean isPlay,
                          Model model)
        Method is called for each button in a button array that makes the grid in the center of the play board. Gives each button some details and an actionListener
        Parameters:
        panel - Panel passed from View class for the button to be added. Panel passed from View is centerPanel.
        isPlay - Boolean value to differentiate between design and play modes for the buttons, since button behaviour is different in both modes.
        model - Model object passed from play(Model model) method in View class.

      • playMode

        public void playMode​(int[][] designGrid,
                     boolean isDesigned,
                     boolean isRand,
                     Model model)
        Method called to start a game, either pre-designed, not designed, or random. This is done through boolean values passed.
        Parameters:
        designGrid - Grid designed by user. Is passed to setPlayGrid.
        isDesigned - Value passed in method call to indicate if the grid has been designed or not.
        isRand - Value passed in method call to indicate of the grid should be randomised.
        model - Model object passed.

      • clueNum

        public java.lang.String clueNum​(boolean top,
                                int z,
                                int[][] grid)
        Method called by Model class in a for loop to display clues on the top and left panels in play mode.
        Parameters:
        top - Boolean value for if the top panel is being used. If false, the left panel is being used.
        z - Index of Label array passed
        grid - grid passed from Model object to iterate through for values
        Returns:
        returns a string to be passed to the label.setText() for the label in that iteration of the for loop in Model Class.

      • saveToFile

        public void saveToFile​(int[][] grid,
                       java.lang.String name)
        Method called from design() in View class. Reads the grid given by user and saves to csv file for later loading.
        Parameters:
        grid - Grid to be saved passed
        name - name of file to be saved.

      • gridCompare

        public boolean gridCompare​(int[][] grid1,
                           int[][] grid2)
        Method called by submitPlay() to check if the user given solution is correct. Compares two int[][], the correct one and the user created one.
        Parameters:
        grid1 - First int[][] to be compared
        grid2 - Second int[][] to be compared
        Returns:
        returns boolean value for if the arrays are the same.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
